name: Celestial (itch) (raidr)
description:
Explore a world conquered by Evil in this 2.5D Puzzle Platformer

After the world lost its protector, The Celestial, the world has become chaotic. Dark environments, destroyed homes and evil creatures roam the various biomes in the world. A lonesome villager must travel across the various biomes, overcome danger and return The Celestial's power source to its corpse. It's up to you to restore balance to the world. 

This project was made as part of a 12 week University project. Majority of the player and visual assets were provided as part of the project. The projects aim was to create a fully playable level that included creating a Level Design Document, Grey-Boxing, and conducting tests throughout the dressing/refinement stage. 

Controls:

AD - Movement

Spacebar - Jump

Left Ctrl - Sneak

Mouse 1 - Interact
